name: Gossamer Open Cardigan - a pure pima cotton sweater for Spring
description:
A stunning raglan cardigan. Inspired by vintage handknits of the 1930's. This cardigan is buttery soft and super light. Designed to fit like a dream and finished with an intricate hand crocheted trim. The perfect light layer for Spring/Summer. 

Handmade in the U.S.A.

fiber: 100% pure pima cotton
care: dry clean

name: Whisperweight Pinafore - a modern frock for Spring - Cream & Lilac
description:
A gorgeous little pinafore for a thoroughly modern girl. Simple stripes in chromatic shades with intricate hand crocheted trim makes this modern heirloom a must have. Perfect for Spring or as a layer over leggings and a tee for Fall.

60% cotton, 40% modal

Machine wash cold gentle, lay flat to dry, tumble to fluff!

name: Gossamer Baby Blanket - a modern feather soft blankie for the young ones - Deep Teal & Apple Green
description:
Feather light and deliciously soft this 100% pima cotton blanket is a rare treat.

Made solely of natural fibers for eco-conscious parents - this lovely blanket is destined to be baby's "blankie" for years to come!

Dimensions: 25" (55cm) x 35" (77cm)

Handmade in the U.S.A.

fiber: 100% pima cotton
care: hand wash, lay flat to dry, tumble dry to fluff

name: Delightful Baby Blanket - a modern wrap for the little ones - Royal Blue Multi
description:
A one of a kind blanket crafted of 100% natural fibers. The perfect way to welcome a new soul to the planet.

fiber: 55% pima cotton, 45% modal (wood pulp)
care: machine wash cold gentle, tumble dry low

name: Delightful Baby Blanket - a modern wrap for the little ones - Pink & Grey Multi
description:
A one of a kind blanket crafted of 100% natural fibers. The perfect way to welcome a new soul to the planet.

fiber: 55% pima cotton, 45% modal (wood pulp)
care: machine wash cold gentle, tumble dry low
